issue.title: *** Disabling the score information in relay ***

content.raw:
Then I have a question for the future about the [ACK signal](#!/osrf/subt/src/default/subt_ign/src/protobuf/artifact.proto) packets being dropped. Would the following scenario be possible inhibiting us from knowing our current score?

Scenario:

1. Send correct artifact to base station 
2. Base station receives artifact
3. ACK packet containing score\_change = 1 is lost
4. We don’t receive ACK signal, so we send the artifact again to the base station.
5. Base station receives repeated artifact
6. ACK packet containing score\_change = 0 is sent and received.

Essentially my question is how can we make sure that we know that we sent in a correct artifact if we lose the ACK signal that has the score\_change = 1?
